snippet.title: EasyPIanoGame trailer(eng)
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1126220/EasyPianoGame/

EasyPianoGame is a music game which uses a simple musical notation that anyone can figure out. Start playing your favorite piano songs by sheet music using just 8 PC keyboard keys. EasyPianoGame uses MIDI files, and songs in MIDI are easy to find, and they are almost always free.
